title: Quick Tab v1.6.4 Sync Fixes
details:
v1.6.4 implements storage persistence for Quick Tab operations:

1. UpdateHandler - Added storage persistence after position/size changes end:
   - handlePositionChangeEnd() now calls _persistToStorage()
   - handleSizeChangeEnd() now calls _persistToStorage()
   - Uses buildStateForStorage() and persistStateToStorage() from @utils/storage-utils.js
   - Requires minimizedManager as 3rd constructor parameter

2. VisibilityHandler - Already had _persistToStorage() for minimize/restore (v1.6.4 fix)

3. Coordinated Clear Pattern for Settings page:
   - Settings sends COORDINATED_CLEAR_ALL_QUICK_TABS to background
   - Background clears storage ONCE, resets cache
   - Background broadcasts QUICK_TABS_CLEARED to tabs
   - Content script clears local state only (no storage write)
   - Prevents storage write storm from N tabs

4. Manager position display: "800Ã—600 at (250, 150)" format
